---
title: FAQ
---

::: {.callout-note title="Can I attend CERE2025 if I'm not presenting?"}
Yes, the conference is open to everyone as long as you Register [here](https://uga.azur-colloque.fr/inscription/en/232/inscription).
:::

::: {.callout-note title="Are there fundings or grants available to attend CERE2025?"}
As we aimed to keep registration fees as low as possible, unfortunately there is no funding or grant available to support attendance at CERE2025.
:::

::: {.callout-note title="Is it possible to have an acceptance letter for my VISA application?"}
Yes, acceptance letter are available upon request to the organisation committee at [CERE2025@univ-grenoble-alpes.fr](mailto:cere2025@univ-grenoble-alpes.fr).
:::

::: {.callout-note title="Can I bring a +1 to the Gala Dinner?"}
Yes, Additional Gala Dinner tickets can be purchased online on the registration portal It can be added to your conference registration or done separately. See more information on [registration portal](https://uga.azur-colloque.fr/inscription/en/232/inscription).
:::

::: {.callout-note title="Can I do my presentation online?"}
No, CERE2025 is a fully in person conference.
:::
